about_the_game:
From the chilling depths of Quetico Forest, where harsh winters shape the land, emerges the Wendigo—a hulking monstrosity born of desperate survival and driven to hunt in the frozen, unforgiving wilderness of Dirge.

Once human, the Wendigo's legend is shrouded in the haunting lore of local indigenous populations. It is said that the creature was driven to madness by the taboo of cannibalism, transforming it into the relentless force that now prowls the snow-covered expanse.

Hunting Grounds:

The Wendigo's original home is the formidable Quetico Forest, known for its harsh winters and vast, unforgiving landscapes. In Dirge, it finds its hunting grounds in the frozen wilderness, making every step treacherous for those who dare to face it.

Survival Tactics:

Defeating the Wendigo requires a strategic approach. Mundane weaponry proves futile against its might, compelling players to weaken the creature before finishing it off with cleansing fire. Teamwork, stealth, and strategic use of fire-based weaponry are key to survival.

Eerie Abilities:

The Wendigo possesses a chilling howl that reveals the locations of humans unless they remain motionless—an invaluable tool for hunting. Its beastly leap can knock back players with tremendous force, creating a dynamic and unpredictable encounter.

Legend and Madness:

Local legends speak of the Wendigo's tragic origin—a creature borne from the depths of human madness. Driven to the ultimate taboo of cannibalism, the Wendigo's transformation into a relentless hunter is both a cautionary tale and a terrifying reality.

Unlockable Nightmare:

With the Wendigo DLC package, step into the monstrous shoes of the Wendigo itself. Traverse the snowy wastes, unleash devastating attacks, and become the embodiment of fear in Dirge. This DLC offers players the unique opportunity to play as the Wendigo, bringing a new perspective to the frozen nightmare.

Features:


  • Physical Powerhouse in the Snowy Wastes
  • Swift Traversal and Enhanced Hunting Senses
  • Devastating Leaping Attack
  • Immunity to Mundane Weapons
  • Vulnerable to the Cleansing Flames

Survive the relentless pursuit as investigators or embrace the terror as the Wendigo—unlock the dark lore of its origin and wield its terrifying power in the chilling landscapes of Dirge.
